translation.en: Hey, stranger.
It's not what it looks like. It is, but I can explain--
translation.it: Non è come sembra. Cioè, sì, ma posso spiegarti…

translation.en: -Ow! [gasps] -[figure whispering] I know…
[woman 1] No.
No! No!
[woman 1] The power to fly. That's what you dream of.
translation.it: Saper volare. È questo che sogniamo.

translation.en: There's no better feeling.
The truth is, you only fly for a second or two
translation.it: La verità è che voli solo un paio di secondi.

translation.en: before gravity takes back what you tried to steal.
translation.it: Poi la gravità si riprende ciò che le appartiene.

translation.en: Because no matter how hard you work, how strong you are, or how thin you get…
translation.it: Perché per quanto lavori sodo e sia forte, o magro,

translation.en: gravity always, always wins.
translation.it: la forza di gravità vince sempre. Sempre.

translation.en: [woman 2] Neveah. Neveah!
Chicago called.
They said they didn't want me.
Something changed their mind.
What happened?
I wish I knew.
Hey.
Good luck in there.
[woman 3] The Archer School of Ballet has bolstered its security protocols,
translation.it: All'Accademia di Danza Archer abbiamo aumentato la sicurezza,

translation.en: offered counseling to all students,
and put the focus squarely back where it should be,
translation.it: e siamo tornati a fare il nostro lavoro:

translation.en: training the next generation of world-class dancers.
translation.it: addestrare i migliori ballerini del mondo.

translation.en: There are reports of angry parents, donors pulling out.
translation.it: Si dice che genitori e donatori si stiano tirando indietro.

translation.en: One star student sadly suffered a fateful misstep.
translation.it: Una delle migliori allieve ha fatto un passo falso.

translation.en: "Misstep"? She fell four stories…
translation.it: "Passo falso"? È precipitata dal quarto piano.

translation.en: [woman 1] Of course, for any dancer, the higher you fly,
translation.it: Certo, per un ballerino, più alto è il volo,

translation.en: the more bone-shattering the landing that inevitably arrives.
You have to be quick on your feet to adapt and deal with the unexpected.
translation.it: Devi essere veloce e adattare i piedi all'imprevisto.

translation.en: And in time,
you learn two tricks that help you survive when there's trouble in the spotlight.
translation.it: insegna due trucchi per sopravvivere sotto i riflettori.

translation.en: First, you never lose your smile.
translation.it: Il primo: mai smettere di sorridere.

translation.en: And second,
you make damn sure you distract them with something else to look at.
translation.it: fare sempre e comunque in modo che il pubblico guardi altrove.

translation.en: [woman 4] Madame DuBois.
[gasps] Monique DuBois! Oh, my gosh!
Welcome to the Archer School of Ballet.
Our newest arrival, here on a full-ride scholarship.
translation.it: La nostra ultima arrivata, borsa di studio completa.

translation.en: We helped a girl escape her dead-end life in Compton.
translation.it: L'abbiamo salvata da una vita senza futuro a Compton.

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -Inglewood, actually, but--
Oh, well, when we see talent, we don't ask where it comes from.
translation.it: Se vediamo il talento, non chiediamo da dove venga.

translation.en: Dancers here have trained since they could walk. Up for the late arrival?
translation.it: Qui i ballerini studiano da una vita. Pronta a recuperare?

translation.en: With a girl of Neveah's talent, two years here will prime her for success.
translation.it: Una ragazza del talento di Neveah in due anni sarà pronta per il successo.

translation.en: Dancing in Cassie Shore's footsteps.
translation.it: Danzando sulle orme di Cassie Shore.

translation.en: Who's Cassie Shore?
We have a tired young lady here. [chuckles]
-Be in touch for a photo release. -[Monique chuckles] Thank you so much.
translation.it: La contatterò per il consenso. Grazie infinite.

translation.en: That went over like a lead balloon.
-Was there something I was-- -Yes, but for now, get her to Alan.
translation.it: - Ho fatto qualcosa… - Sì. Ma intanto portala da Alan.

translation.en: [Cassie] They start with your bones, then your feet, frame, and flexibility.
translation.it: Cominciano con le ossa, poi piedi, struttura e flessibilità.

translation.en: Your musicality, charisma, and deference.
Then after they've taken you apart…
they wanna see a spark.
It's so we can check your alignment,
see how your turnout is regressing.
You sure she'll do the trick?
[Monique] It's a start.
I'm also announcing the premiere of a new ballet by Ramon Costa.
translation.it: Annuncerò anche la prima di un balletto di Ramon Costa.

translation.en: Ramon Costa? But we don't have him.
Yet.
Neveah, there's a photo of your dad on file. What about your mother?
translation.it: Neveah, abbiamo una foto di tuo padre. Che ci dici di tua madre?

translation.en: What about her?
We predict how you'll develop from the--
translation.it: Le nostre previsioni si basano su…

translation.en: I know, but you already accepted me.
translation.it: Lo so, ma mi avete già accettato.

translation.en: This Cassie Shore, what went down?
translation.it: Questa Cassie Shore… che è successo?

translation.en: There was an accident.
So she's gone, and that's why I'm here?
translation.it: Quindi lei è fuori e avete chiamato me?

translation.en: You're here, Neveah, because you have something special.
translation.it: Sei qui, Neveah, perché hai qualcosa di speciale.

translation.en: Now go out there and make sure they see it.
translation.it: Ora va' e mostralo a tutti.

translation.en: Okay, so you're tier three, ages 16 and 17.
translation.it: Ok, quindi tu sei al terzo livello, 16 e 17 anni.

translation.en: Doors lock at curfew, and all guests sign in.
Academics are from eight to noon.
You missed today, but I got your homework.
translation.it: Oggi hai saltato, ma hai i compiti.

translation.en: And then dance is from 1:00 to 6:30.
translation.it: Poi la danza è dalle 13 alle 18:30.

translation.en: Lights out at ten.
Honey.
[taps on door] Here's home.
Your roommate's name is June.
You drink or smoke, you're out. You fail your academics, you're gone.
translation.it: Fuma, bevi e sei fuori. Un'insufficienza e ciao.

translation.en: You get too skinny, you're sent home.
You get caught screwing a boy, or a girl, for that matter, bye-bye.
translation.it: Fatti beccare a letto con un ragazzo, o ragazza, e arrivederci.

translation.en: Basically, just act like I'm watching everything, because I am.
translation.it: Quindi fai tutto come se io stessi guardando, perché è così.

translation.en: Toodles.
Thanks.
Did she say one? Oh, shit.
[man] All right, everyone, let's get started.
-Facing the barre in sixth, please. -You're in my spot.
translation.it: Alla sbarra in sesta, per favore. Lì ci sto io.

translation.en: [man] Pressing over to three-quarter pointe plié. Right, left.
translation.it: Plié sulle mezze punte. Destra, sinistra.

translation.en: Rolling through the feet.
-And reverse. -Sorry, that's mine.
Rise, test your balance.
Open to first.
-Repeat in second. -And anywhere but there.
And finish with a four-count side bend, right, left.
translation.it: Piegamento laterale in quattro tempi, destra, sinistra.

translation.en: -And a nice, full rond de corps… -Everyone's got their place.
translation.it: - E un ronde de corps. - I posti sono presi.

translation.en: [man] Yes! Let's have a waltz, please. Thank you, Richard.
translation.it: Un valzer, per favore. Grazie, Richard.

translation.en: And…
-[man] Relax the ankles in the demi. -You're in the sticks, darling.
translation.it: Rilassate le caviglie nel demi. Sei nei bassifondi.

translation.en: [man] Keep the heels together as you roll through.
And demi.
And double.
And lengthen into the grand…
Present the heel in the tendu devant, people!
translation.it: Mostrate il tallone nel tendu devant, gente!

translation.en: Humor me, please! People, close the ribs!
translation.it: Datemi una gioia, chiudete le costole!

translation.en: I need to see the fifth.
Make your transitions precise.
Your weight over your supporting leg does not mean slouching.
translation.it: Il peso sulla gamba di sostegno non significa ingobbirsi.

translation.en: -We don't wear junk here. -Junk?
Junk. You've covered what I need to see.
translation.it: Stai coprendo quello che voglio vedere.

translation.en: Lift in the attitude.
You're sinking in your port de bras. Sternum up.
translation.it: Quel port de bras è basso. Su lo sterno.

translation.en: Drop that hip.
Nope, your hip's still up to your ear.
Your weight's in your heels. You need to be over your supporting leg.
translation.it: Hai il peso sui talloni. Vai sopra la gamba di sostegno.

translation.en: Drop your hip.
Lift.
Bette, demonstrate to the side.
-[piano music fades] -Look. Do you see?
Okay, I'll spare you.
Just visiting?
New admission.
Then show up next class in proper attire with better shoes.
translation.it: La prossima volta attenta ad abbigliamento e scarpette.

translation.en: Those are a fiasco.
Bette, your second arm is late.
Your second arm is late.
No. Try a higher passé.
translation.it: No. Prova un passé più alto.

translation.en: -[piano music fades] -Another year, and still not a turner.
translation.it: Dopo un anno ancora non sai girare.

translation.en: Your summer break did you no favors.
translation.it: La pausa estiva non vi ha fatto bene.

translation.en: So, tomorrow after class, we'll begin pas de deux.
translation.it: Domani dopo la lezione inizieremo il pas de deux.

translation.en: But this term, each of you will be assigned just one partner.
translation.it: In questo semestre vi sarà assegnato un solo partner.

translation.en: Trust in this building has been broken,
translation.it: La fiducia in questo edificio è stata minata

translation.en: and this may help rebuild it.
[quietly] Wow. He's amazing!
Yeah, if you're hot for psychos. You ask me, he pushed her.
translation.it: Se hai un debole per gli spostati. Per me l'ha spinta lui.

translation.en: Nabil, very good.
Pushed who?
His girlfriend, Cassie.
Pinch whatever you need to and get busy.
This is every shoe that ballerinas at City Works rejected,
translation.it: Tutte le scarpette scartate dalle ballerine della City Works.

translation.en: yours for a few bucks.
You did pretty good today.
[scoffs] Are you kidding? I could not get on my leg. We've all been there.
translation.it: - Scherzi? Non mi reggevo sulla gamba. - Ci siamo passati tutti.

translation.en: You think this place can make me company-ready in two years?
translation.it: In due anni qui diventerò professionista?

translation.en: I've seen them do more with less. But if they're wrong, you're gone.
translation.it: - Hanno fatto anche di peggio. - Ma se si sbagliano, ciao.

translation.en: I'm sorry, we haven't met.
Bette. This is June.
translation.it: Sono Bette. E lei è June.

translation.en: Show me your arches.
-What, my feet? -[June] That won't make a dancer.
translation.it: - I piedi? - Fanno di te una ballerina.

translation.en: Where'd you train?
Bette's just scoping the competish. Scared.
Anyone who got in this late must be fierce prima material.
translation.it: Chi inizia tardi, di solito ha talento da prima ballerina.

translation.en: All right, pretty good. [sighs]
Friends. [chuckles]
Neveah, these would be perfect for you.
Double X, high vamp?
What is…
Are these Delia Whitlaw's shoes?
Well, her rejects.
[boy] They look like a perfect fit.
-Isn't that interesting, Bette? -You're trash, Shane.
translation.it: Curioso, vero, Bette? Shane, tu sei feccia.

translation.en: Have fun scavenging with your new petit rat.
[June] Bye.
-Did she just call me a-- -[Shane] A rat, yep.
But like everything in ballet, it sounds better in French.
translation.it: Ma come tutto ciò che è danza, in francese suona meglio.

translation.en: A little rat's a dancer who's young, pretty, poor, and hella strong.
translation.it: Un petit rat è un ballerino giovane, carino, povero e… forte come un leone.

translation.en: And this one here wears the shoes of Delia fricking Whitlaw.
translation.it: E questa topolina cazzuta indosserà le scarpette di Delia Whitlaw.

translation.en: It's crazy.
I only applied to the Archer because it's where she went.
translation.it: Ho fatto domanda alla Archer per lei.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
Then let's get you a front-row seat.
-[grunts] -Easy, man.
-Hey. -[grunts] What the fuck!
You're good.
I'm not good. I had another one in me.
translation.it: No, invece. Un altro mi ci stava.

translation.en: Blowing out a pec ain't gonna help with your dancing.
translation.it: Uno strappo al pettorale non aiuta.

translation.en: You heard Brooks. I'm out of shape.
translation.it: Hai sentito Brooks. Sono fuori forma.

translation.en: [grunts] Guaranteed he wasn't talking about you.
translation.it: Sono certo non parlasse di te.

translation.en: [boy] Caleb, check it out. Second time that cop's talked to him.
translation.it: Caleb, guarda. - L'ho già visto con quella poliziotta. - Sospetterà di lui.

translation.en: She must smell blood.
translation.it: - L'ho già visto con quella poliziotta. - Sospetterà di lui.

translation.en: You tell her anything?
[exhales] Oren, we all stuck to the same story.
translation.it: Oren, diamo tutti la stessa versione.

translation.en: Cassie was alone. We weren't there.
You sure impressed Brooks today.
Not really.
A little rusty.
Must suck, coming all this way to be with your girlfriend…
translation.it: Dura, eh? Venire fin qui per stare con la tua ragazza,

translation.en: and then she goes and falls off the fucking building.
translation.it: e lei cade dal tetto, cazzo!

translation.en: I came here to study dance. Chicago made an offer I cannot refuse.
translation.it: Sono qui per studiare. Chicago mi ha fatto un'ottima offerta.

translation.en: [Oren] I was watching you.
I know.
You don't have the American style.
That's true.
I'm more than tits and teeth.
translation.it: Non sono solo tette e culo.

translation.en: I watched you too.
You're banal, safe.
Safe till you showed up.
And then… [whistles]
Splat.
And now the cops.
I tell her how Cassie told me how you would drop her.
translation.it: Ho detto che Cassie aveva paura di te.

translation.en: Perhaps sabotage--
[Oren] I was the best partner she ever had!
translation.it: Sono stato il suo miglior partner.

translation.en: -[Nabil] Gotta show me respect. -Hey, guys, break it up!
You don't belong here.
-Oh, my God. -I have goose bumps, look.
translation.it: - Oddio. - Ho la pelle d'oca. Guarda.

translation.en: Do you know, I've seen, like, a hundred videos of her?
City Works is lucky to get her back.
After rocking it in Europe last year, she could write her own ticket.
translation.it: Dopo la tournée in Europa poteva mollarli.

translation.en: [man] Don't be dragged by the tempi. Anticipate.
Oh, she's a goddess.
[man] All right. Let this section travel more.
[Shane sighs] So good.
Footwork needs refining.
[Delia] I'm giving it all I've got, Ramon.
There's no room for me in the choreography.
translation.it: Non ho spazio in questa coreografia.

translation.en: [Ramon] You're dancing from here.
But I need to see it here.
And when the night comes…
here.
The piece is in you.
I'm only drawing it out. Come on.
translation.it: Io lo sto tirando fuori. Forza.

translation.en: Touch an audience the same way that you would touch me.
translation.it: Tocca il pubblico come toccheresti me.

translation.en: Come on, girl, tear off his shirt.
[Delia] Like this?
If it's something you can use.
Let's go.
[Shane] Well, that's no fun.
[Cassie] Always, something hurts.
Somewhere on your body, there's pain,
an ache that comes from pushing beyond what any person was ever meant to do.
translation.it: che deriva dallo spingersi oltre qualsiasi limite umano.

translation.en: But there's strength in being part of a larger body.
translation.it: Ma far parte di un corpo grande dà forza.

translation.en: [girl laughs] Please.
[Cassie] The corps de ballet.
-[giggling] -[June] Well, she's certainly got style.
[Bette] Yeah, for a pole dancer.
-That there isn't even ballet. -[hip-hop music playing]
Guys.
Found your little dance show.
Very cute.
At least somebody here actually likes to dance. That what this is for you?
translation.it: - Almeno a qualcuno qui piace ballare. - È questo per te?

translation.en: Playtime?
You just told me I was good enough to be your friend.
translation.it: Avevi detto che potevamo essere amiche.

translation.en: It wasn't because you were good, Petit Rat.
translation.it: Non perché sei brava, petit rat.

translation.en: It's because I was better.
translation.it: Ma perché sono migliore di te.

translation.en: I get that I'm late to the party, and I get that I might ruin your little plan
translation.it: So di essere l'ultima arrivata e forse ti sto rovinando il piano

translation.en: to be the next queen bee around here,
but I got up in here fair and square, and you best believe I'm coming for you.
translation.it: ma sono entrata qui lealmente e, credimi, ti raggiungerò.

translation.en: Miss Stroyer, Madame DuBois wants to see you.
translation.it: Sig.na Stroyer? Madame DuBois vuole vederti.

translation.en: Now.
Relax, officer. It's cortisone.
If I could just speak to a few more students--
I spoke to your sergeant. The case is closed.
translation.it: Ho parlato col suo sergente. Il caso è chiuso.

translation.en: Yet a beat cop is here exploiting an awful accident,
translation.it: Una poliziotta di quartiere che sfrutta un orribile incidente

translation.en: traumatizing my students, for what?
translation.it: traumatizzando i miei allievi, per cosa?

translation.en: You can't tell me you're satisfied. [Monique] You can't tell me you're getting anywhere.
translation.it: - Non mi dirà che è contenta. - Non mi dirà che ha una pista.

translation.en: You've had a week to find one iota of foul play, but it all adds up to a tragic fall.
translation.it: Cerca indizi di reato da una settimana, ma è sempre ferma a una tragica caduta.

translation.en: Piercing this takes time. Every institution has its secrets.
translation.it: Ci vuole tempo. Ogni istituzione ha dei segreti.

translation.en: Before the police, you were in the army?
God knows what you did there, officer, but ballet is no place for redemption.
translation.it: Dio solo sa cosa ha combinato, ma non cerchi redenzione nella danza.

translation.en: I found her.
We were just wrapping up.
Settling in, I hope.
Dégagez, officer.
You wanted to see me?
[Monique] You're to attend tonight's donor reception.
translation.it: Stasera andrai al ricevimento dei donatori.

translation.en: A driver will fetch you with the others,
and Selena can help you find something presentable in the costume department.
translation.it: e Selena ti procurerà qualcosa di presentabile dal reparto costumi.

translation.en: -I have my own clothes. -Of course you do.
translation.it: - Ho i miei vestiti. - Lo so.

translation.en: But ballet demands a certain--
-Merde! -Oh! Apologies, Madame.
That was bone you hit.
We are about to invest thousands of dollars in you,
translation.it: Stiamo per investire migliaia di dollari su di te

translation.en: and we need to know that in two years' time, you will be a product…
translation.it: e dobbiamo essere certi che tra due anni sarai un prodotto…

translation.en: -Product? -…that we can make use of.
You're either the ASB's future or a bad gamble.
translation.it: O sei il futuro della scuola, o un cattivo investimento.

translation.en: Our key donors will be asking themselves that very question tonight.
translation.it: I nostri donatori si porranno esattamente la stessa domanda stasera.

translation.en: On these cards is the story you'll want to tell.
translation.it: Qui c'è scritta la storia che racconterai.

translation.en: Madame DuBois, I'm just here to dance.
translation.it: Madame DuBois, io sono qui solo per danzare.

translation.en: Wrong. Tonight decides your future as much as anything you do in class.
translation.it: Falso. Il tuo futuro si decide tanto stasera quanto in classe.

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a price you pay learning to fly.
translation.it: Imparare a volare ha un prezzo.

translation.en: They steal your childhood, your family…
-Hey. -…leave you only with friends who hope every day that your Achilles will snap.
translation.it: e ti restano solo amici che ogni giorno sperano in un tuo infortunio.

translation.en: And they never let you grow up.
[Cassie] So if you wanna live a little…
you gotta get creative.
[sighs] God, I need this.
I was thinking we should get ourselves cast as partners.
translation.it: Pensavo che dovremmo chiedere di fare coppia.

translation.en: -[Bette] Huh? -We'd dominate.
Word is, I'm getting paired with Nabil. So we fight it.
translation.it: - A quanto pare sarò in coppia con Nabil. - Opponiamoci.

translation.en: [scoffs] I don't want to rock the boat.
Aw, jeez.
-[exhales] -You think Frenchie's better than me.
translation.it: Il francesino è migliore di me?

translation.en: And you don't want to be stuck tossing around the new girl.
translation.it: E tu non vorrai far volteggiare quella nuova?

translation.en: We can all fake a lot of things onstage.
translation.it: Sul palco fingiamo un sacco di cose.

translation.en: -But we can't fake love. -Oh, yeah. I can.
translation.it: Ma non l'amore. Sì. Io sì.

translation.en: -No candles. -[taps on door]
-[panting] Someone's coming. -[grunts]
Oh, well, I guess it's not gonna be me.
Oh, I just gotta work out this cramp. Brooks had us do push-ups after barre.
translation.it: Ho un crampo. Brooks ci ha ucciso con le flessioni.

translation.en: Honey, I don't care if you broke a bone. If Bette's in there, the door is open.
translation.it: Me ne frego se hai le ossa rotte. Con Bette, porta aperta.

translation.en: Except they're busy.
Fighting.
I don't hear it.
The silent treatment phase. Brutal.
translation.it: È la fase del muso. Brutale.

translation.en: Yeah. Do you want to see brutal?
-No. -No.
Oh, hey, Torri.
You know the rules.
Did the door blow shut? I hadn't noticed. Oren, did you notice?
translation.it: La porta si è chiusa? Non me ne ero accorta. Tu, Oren?

translation.en: -Was deep into the causes of the Cold War. -[Torri] Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Ero immerso nelle cause della Guerra Fredda.

translation.en: Actually, Torri, I'm glad you came by. You know I'm attending that event later?
translation.it: Ma grazie per essere passata. Sai che ho quell'evento dopo?

translation.en: I have this lovely, bejeweled cocktail mini,
translation.it: Ho un abitino da cocktail decorato,

translation.en: but the tulle's a little fuzzy, so I'll need use of an iron.
translation.it: ma il tulle è crespo e serve una stirata.

translation.en: -[exhales] -I'm done playing this game.
Hey, I owe you one.
Why didn't I just borrow one of theirs?
translation.it: Perché non ho preso uno dei loro?

translation.en: That looks nice.
I'm so not ready for this.
Okay, let me have a look at what I have.
translation.it: Ok, fammi dare un'occhiata ai miei.

translation.en: Yeah.
You just need a little extra zhuzh.
translation.it: Ti serve solo un po' di brio.

translation.en: Or… like that.
That looks chic. And the other girls, they're just jealous.
translation.it: Molto chic. Le altre sono solo gelose.

translation.en: Of what?
You saw how the ballet master was going at me.
translation.it: Hai visto il maestro come si è accanito?

translation.en: Wrong this, wrong that.
At least he was paying you attention.
He never gives me a single correction.
translation.it: A me non dice mai nulla.

translation.en: -Maybe you're already good enough. -It's ballet. Nobody's good enough.
translation.it: - Sarai perfetta. - È danza classica, nessuno lo è.

translation.en: [Cassie] There's a twisted bargain to ballet.
translation.it: Nella danza c'è un beneficio perverso.

translation.en: After all your hard work, your pain and sacrifice,
translation.it: Dopo il lavoro, il sudore e i sacrifici

translation.en: when you walk among mortals,
translation.it: una volta tra i comuni mortali

translation.en: you become a god.
You're a perfect, worshipped fruition of the best the body can do.
translation.it: Sei la perfetta e venerabile incarnazione del meglio che il corpo può fare.

translation.en: [photographer] Fantastic. Thank you. Can we get a quick candid with you?
translation.it: Grazie mille. Un bello scatto di voi quattro?

translation.en: Yeah, together. All right, big smiles, now.
Love it. Fantastic suit.
-♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
translation.it: SCONOSCIUTO - IGNORAMI PURE, IL MONDO SAPRÀ COS'HAI FATTO

translation.en: -♪ Or are you man enough for me? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough for me? ♪
-♪ Or are you man enough to be? ♪ -♪ Are you man enough to be? ♪
translation.it: QUALCUNO A CUI HAI FATTO MALE.

translation.en: And after this past week, I have to admit
translation.it: E dopo quest'ultima settimana devo ammettere

translation.en: that it turns out not all press is good press.
translation.it: che non ci si può sempre fidare della stampa.

translation.en: [Monique] But thanks to you here, this school is stronger than ever.
translation.it: Ma grazie a tutti voi, la scuola è più forte che mai.

translation.en: Inspired by your faith and generosity,
translation.it: Ispirata dalla vostra fiducia e generosità,

translation.en: the school will be creating a new ballet
translation.it: la scuola darà vita a un nuovo balletto

translation.en: in Cassie's honor,
by renowned choreographer Ramon Costa.
translation.it: a opera del famoso coreografo Ramon Costa.

translation.en: -[crowd gasps] -You gotta be kidding me.
The ballet world will soon have its eye on the school for the right reasons.
translation.it: Il mondo della danza menzionerà la scuola per le giuste ragioni.

translation.en: To a bright future. [man] Yeah, cheers! Bright future!
This had better work.
Yes, and we appreciate the support from enthusiasts like you.
translation.it: Apprezziamo il sostegno degli entusiasti come  te.

translation.en: I'm worth a lot more than a fat check.
translation.it: Valgo molto di più di un assegno generoso.

translation.en: Leave the Archer to its director.
Let's just hope the crisis isn't beyond you.
translation.it: Spero la crisi non sia troppo per te.

translation.en: Hello again.
Hey there.
So I hear they call you the wrench? With a name like Alan, it kind of fits.
translation.it: - So che la chiamano "Chiave inglese". - È per il mio aplomb.

translation.en: How was your first day?
They kind of threw me in the deep end.
You've got a decent arch and open hips, and around here, that'll get you far.
translation.it: Hai dei begli archi, e anche aperte. Ti porteranno lontano.

translation.en: Tell it to that sadistic jackass.
translation.it: Lo dica a quel sadico di merda.

translation.en: The way he rolls? You have no idea.
translation.it: Non ha idea di come ci tratta.

translation.en: Oh, I do. Topher Brooks is my husband.
translation.it: Sì che ce l'ho. Topher Brooks è mio marito.

translation.en: Well…
better mingle. [exhales]
I'm not doing it, Monique.
Once I set this new piece at City Works, I'm back to Paris.
translation.it: Dopo il pezzo alla City Works torno a Parigi.

translation.en: To choreograph another art wank?
Ramon, I'm offering you a safe place to work out big ideas, get a jump on talent.
translation.it: Ramon, io ti offro un posto sicuro per grandi idee con grandi talenti.

translation.en: He's got all the talent he needs.
[Monique] It would show loyalty to the school,
which means loyalty to the professional company we build dancers for.
translation.it: nonché alla compagnia professionistica per cui formiamo ballerini.

translation.en: City Works Ballet will commission a full-length work next year.
translation.it: L'anno prossimo la City Works ci commissionerà un balletto.

translation.en: If you work with us, I'll push for you to get that gig.
translation.it: Se lavori con noi, lo farò avere a te.

translation.en: I know you're desperate to tell a new story, Monique…
translation.it: So quanto ti serva un cambiamento, Monique,

translation.en: but I'm long past being your boy toy.
translation.it: ma non sono più il tuo burattino.

translation.en: Darling, there's cheese on that.
Trust me, Mother, I earned it today.
translation.it: Fidati, mamma, me lo merito oggi.

translation.en: I'm glad to hear. Oren, what a delight. -Mrs. Whitlaw. Thanks for having us. -[kisses]
translation.it: - Ne sono felice. Oren, che piacere. - Sig.ra Whitlaw, grazie dell'invito.

translation.en: I swear we host these jamborees just to clap eyes on our girls.
translation.it: Organizziamo queste feste solo per ammirare le ragazze.

translation.en: I hope we'll all be seeing lots of you two this season, onstage and off.
translation.it: Spero di vedervi insieme questa stagione, sul palcoscenico e non.

translation.en: I hope so too.
Tell us.
Is this a star pairing or what?
translation.it: Non ti sembrano la coppia perfetta?

translation.en: Partners have already been finalized.
translation.it: Le coppie sono già state decise.

translation.en: I'm sure you'll do the right thing.
I always do, Katrina.
Mom, you can't boss around my ballet master!
translation.it: Mamma, non puoi dare ordini al mio maestro di danza.

translation.en: I wouldn't dream of it.
Now, let's get you in front of Ramon Costa.
Where's that shawl that goes with that dress?
translation.it: Dov'è lo scialle che va con quel vestito?

translation.en: I didn't need it tonight.
Those bony shoulders are turning heads. You're not eating enough.
translation.it: Quelle spalle magre attirano l'attenzione. Non mangi abbastanza.

translation.en: I'm fine, Mom, and I'm glad to see you.
translation.it: Sto bene, mamma, e sono felice di vederti.

translation.en: Well, I had a flight back to New York tonight. But some things are more important.
translation.it: Avevo un volo per New York stasera, ma certe cose sono più importanti.

translation.en: Exactly. What happened to Cassie reminds us all, life's short.
translation.it: Esatto. L'incidente di Cassie ci rammenta che la vita è breve.

translation.en: What's your role?
My role?
Your part in the ballet showcase.
Oh. Well, with the accident, they've delayed any casting announcements.
translation.it: Per via dell'incidente non si sa ancora.

translation.en: Bloody artists, can't keep their schedule.
It's The Sleeping Beauty this year, which is perfect for me.
translation.it: Sarà La bella addormentata nel bosco, perfetto per me.

translation.en: Everybody says I'm guaranteed to dance Aurora now.
translation.it: Tutti dicono che mi faranno fare Aurora.

translation.en: -Why can't you believe in me? -[mother] I do.
translation.it: - Perché non credi in me? - Ci credo.

translation.en: I'm just not paying through the teeth so you can get a rubbish education and no future.
translation.it: Ma non sborso un patrimonio per istruzione scadente e nessun futuro.

translation.en: I get it. You want a doctor, a lawyer, a senator.
translation.it: Ho capito. Mi volevi medico, avvocato o senatrice.

translation.en: Mom, I just want to dance.
So dance… in your bedroom, in the shower.
translation.it: E danza… in camera, in doccia.

translation.en: Go prance at your prom like every other teenage girl.
translation.it: Al ballo della scuola come tutte le adolescenti.

translation.en: But I did not raise my only child to prop up the scenery.
translation.it: Non ho cresciuto la mia unica figlia per fare scenografia.

translation.en: You're either on track to make principal dancer or you're out.
translation.it: O sei in corsa da prima ballerina, o sei fuori.

translation.en: Mom!
I'm on track.
Look, I'll get a lead role, and every artistic director will want me
translation.it: Avrò un ruolo da protagonista e tutti i coreografi mi vorranno

translation.en: because Cassie won't be stealing my spotlight.
translation.it: perché Cassie non può più rubarmi la scena.

translation.en: She didn't steal it, June. She's better than you.
translation.it: Non ti rubava nulla, June. Era più brava.

translation.en: She's not better than me now.
Now, that's my girl.
What do you think is one of the factors that gave you the cutting edge
translation.it: Quale pensi sia il fattore che ti ha dato la marcia in più

translation.en: to get you where you are today?
I think it was the gymnastics that helped me advance so quickly
translation.it: Credo sia stata la ginnastica a farmi progredire

translation.en: when I started ballet.
And the hip-hop stuff I do, it's kind of--
translation.it: E l'hip hop che faccio, è…

translation.en: I saw some videos online.
translation.it: Ho visto i tuoi video online.

translation.en: There's a wonderful power to them.
-[camera shutters click] -It's just me messing around.
The girls here diss them big time.
translation.it: Le altre ragazze mi prendono in giro.

translation.en: I mean, I've seen some rough stuff back home,
translation.it: Dalle mie parti ne ho viste di cotte e di crude

translation.en: but nothing compared to this shit.
Yes, what I think Neveah would like to emphasize
is how the ASB is about the f--
Fundamentals. Yes.
In which I am in great need of.
translation.it: Di cui io sono in debito.

translation.en: I have raw talent, but that needs shaping if I want a career in ballet.
translation.it: Ho un talento grezzo che deve essere plasmato, se voglio fare la ballerina.

translation.en: And for that, the Archer School is the best place.
translation.it: L'Accademia Archer è il luogo migliore per farlo.

translation.en: Well, thank you, Neveah. And good luck.
translation.it: Grazie, Neveah. E in bocca al lupo.

translation.en: -[Monique] Thank you. -[reporter] Thank you.
You had a script.
I also had a life.
Why are you here slumming with the students?
translation.it: Che ci fai con gli studenti?

translation.en: -I figured if Ramon was coming-- -Smart.
-Keep an eye on him. -Hmm.
Ramon Costa, may I present my daughter Bette?
translation.it: Ramon Costa, le presento mia figlia Bette.

translation.en: ASB's next star graduate. He's already working with a graduate.
translation.it: - Futura diplomata dell'Accademia. - Lavora già con una diplomata.

translation.en: We're not potato chips, Delia. -You can have more than one. -[phone beeps]
translation.it: Non siamo patatine, Delia. Può prenderne più di una.

translation.en: Mr. Costa, I hope you have a chance to watch me in class tomorrow.
translation.it: Spero che domani verrà a vedermi a lezione.

translation.en: I'm not in the habit of viewing students.
Too bad. You might be surprised.
translation.it: Peccato, non sa cosa si perde.

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -[laughs] Thank you so much.
It's so good to see you. Thank you, Zandara.
translation.it: - Perfetto. - È stato un piacere. Grazie, Zandara.

translation.en: -Just gotta say, huge fan. -You're very kind.
translation.it: Sono una tua grande fan. Troppo buona.

translation.en: Neveah Stroyer. It's my first day here.
Yes, I saw Monique parading you around.
translation.it: Sì, ho visto Monique che ti sfoggiava.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm not sure I landed my jumps, you know what I mean?
translation.it: Non penso di averle fatto una gran impressione.

translation.en: You kick high and smile, she'll love you.
translation.it: Solleva bene la gamba e sorridi. Ti amerà.

translation.en: This one wears your shoes.
My what?
Your pointe shoes.
Crams her little bunions into them like she's Cinderella.
translation.it: Spinge i calli a forza come Cenerentola.

translation.en: Actually, Cinderella's foot fits perfect--
translation.it: Veramente a Cenerentola calzano a pennello.

translation.en: Bette, have you been drinking?
-Did no one here get told fairy tales? -We were too busy living them.
translation.it: - Non vi raccontavano le favole? - Le vivevamo.

translation.en: This isn't your world, little rat. Knowing the steps doesn't mean you belong.
translation.it: Non è il tuo mondo. Sapere i passi non basta.

translation.en: Well, someone here must think I do.
-You don't get it, do you? -Bette, quit it.
The only reason Monique let you in was to give the school a shiny, new distraction
translation.it: Monique ti ha ammessa solo per creare un diversivo

translation.en: after stupid Cassie bled out on the street.
translation.it: dal volo di quella scema di Cassie.

translation.en: But you're even stupider. You can't see they're using you.
translation.it: Ma tu sei ancora più scema. Non capisci che ti usano.

translation.en: You'd just rather stand here star-fucking my sister.
translation.it: E sei in adorazione di mia sorella.

translation.en: Sister?
Neveah, if you're here, you're good.
translation.it: Neveah, se sei qui, vuol dire che sei brava.

translation.en: Just wanted to let you know I landed.
You're doing that thing you do when you're trying not to cry.
translation.it: Stai cercando di non piangere, lo vedo.

translation.en: -I don't have a thing I do. -Hell yeah, you do.
translation.it: - Non ce la farò mai. - Certo che sì.

translation.en: You know, for a star dancer, your muscle control sucks.
translation.it: Non sei tanto brava a fingere.

translation.en: And so does my situation here.
I need money. I'll pay you back, I promise.
translation.it: Mi servono soldi. Te li restituirò, promesso.

translation.en: -You're not coming home. -It's not working!
translation.it: - A casa non torni. - Non funziona!

translation.en: They got me playing some crazy-ass script that's not even me.
translation.it: Mi hanno fatto recitare un copione assurdo.

translation.en: You did it. You got out.
What for, Ty?
I came here to dance,
to do the one thing in my crazy-ass life that I can hold onto,
translation.it: Per fare l'unica cosa in cui credo in questa vita assurda.

translation.en: and they don't care about that.
So what?
I don't fit in.
Well, halle-fucking-lujah!
What dancer wants to?
Nevie, you're never getting this chance again,
translation.it: Nevie, questa è la tua chance.

translation.en: so you take everything you can from those freaks,
and when you're done, stratosphere.
translation.it: e quando hai finito… vai sulla luna.

translation.en: Stratosphere, baby.
[Nabil] Neveah.
Nabil, hey.
If you need someone else to say you are a good dancer…
translation.it: Se hai bisogno che ti dicano che sei brava…

translation.en: …you aren't.
But when you don't look like you jumped out of the music box--
translation.it: Se non sembri uscito da un carillon…

translation.en: -[Nabil] It's not how we look. -I see who these ballet companies hire,
translation.it: Non siamo così. Ho visto chi assumono le compagnie, e spesso e volentieri non siamo noi.

translation.en: and most of the time, it's not us.
translation.it: Ho visto chi assumono le compagnie, e spesso e volentieri non siamo noi.

translation.en: [Shane] Ow, fuck me!
-[grunts] -[Nabil] Hey, Shane.
-The party's over. -[Shane] Party is only starting, Nabil.
translation.it: - La festa è finita. - La festa sta per iniziare, Nabil.

translation.en: We're just warming up.
Now the old farts are tucking in, we're getting busy.
translation.it: I vecchi vanno a nanna e noi in pista!

translation.en: I heard what you were saying about not fitting the mold.
translation.it: Ho sentito cosa dicevi sull'essere diversa.

translation.en: That's a good thing, and it always has been.
translation.it: È una cosa positiva, lo è sempre stata.

translation.en: So if you ever want proof that dancers like you have been around forever…
translation.it: Se ti servono prove che di ballerine come te ce ne sono da sempre,

translation.en: …say the word. I'll show you some.
Go open the gate and let in the masses!
Hey. June Park, isn't it?
-Officer Cruz? -Yeah.
You're out late.
My mother's in town.
Oh, that's nice. Little support these days.
translation.it: Bello. Ti servirà un po' di conforto.

translation.en: After all, you were Cassie's roommate, weren't you?
translation.it: Tu eri la compagna di stanza di Cassie, giusto?

translation.en: Yeah.
Must be hard for you, lying in your bed, staring at her empty one,
translation.it: - Sì. - Deve essere dura. Dormire accanto a quel letto vuoto chiedendoti che cosa sia successo.

translation.en: asking yourself, "What the hell happened?"
translation.it: Dormire accanto a quel letto vuoto chiedendoti che cosa sia successo.

translation.en: Isn't your investigation over? Officially, yeah, but I…
translation.it: - Le indagini non erano finite? - Ufficialmente, ma…

translation.en: I lost someone… not that long ago, and I can't shake it.
translation.it: Ho perso una persona, non tanto tempo fa, e ci sto ancora male.

translation.en: Bet you can't either.
They all say she slipped.
You ask me, she jumped. Then how'd she land on her back?
translation.it: - Per me si è buttata. - Atterrando di schiena?

translation.en: Maybe she wasn't interested in admiring the view on the way down.
translation.it: Forse non le interessava il panorama.

translation.en: No history of depression, no note. Who'd read it?
translation.it: - Niente depressione, niente biglietto… - Per chi?

translation.en: We all admired Cassie, but we didn't much like her.
translation.it: Tutti ammiravamo Cassie, ma non piaceva a nessuno.

translation.en: A raft of rivals.
-And this. -[cell phone beeps]
I took this on the roof today. See that? Those are scuff marks.
translation.it: L'ho scattata oggi sul tetto. Sono graffi. Qualcuno opponeva resistenza.

translation.en: Someone was backing away. They were trying to get free of something.
translation.it: Sono graffi. Qualcuno opponeva resistenza. Penso cercasse di liberarsi.

translation.en: Are-- are you saying Cassie was pushed?
I'm not saying anything.
Look. I don't know a nutcracker from my nightstick,
translation.it: Non distinguo uno schiaccianoci da un manganello,

translation.en: but I know danger when I see it.
Folks at your school might keep getting hurt unless we shine a light.
translation.it: Potrebbero esserci altre vittime se non facciamo chiarezza.

translation.en: Here's my card.
There's rules, officer.
And I'm not the one around here to break them.
translation.it: E non sarò io a violarle.

translation.en: [Cassie] All day, someone else controls what you eat,
translation.it: Tutto il giorno controllano cosa mangi,

translation.en: what you wear, how you move, and who you touch.
translation.it: come ti vesti, come ti muovi e chi tocchi.

translation.en: You're strapped into the roller coaster with your fiercest competitors.
translation.it: Sei sulle montagne russe con i tuoi più acerrimi nemici.

translation.en: But what nobody else sees
translation.it: Ma quello che non vede nessuno

translation.en: is those rivals are also the only people who get you…
translation.it: è che quei nemici sono gli unici che ti capiscono,

translation.en: who celebrate you for who you are and challenge you to do better.
translation.it: ti apprezzano per come sei e ti sfidano a fare meglio.

translation.en: There's no other way to say it.
They're your tribe.
Hey. You know I don't go there.
translation.it: Ehi. Sai che non lo faccio.

translation.en: Except I kind of do.
We're just helping each other out here.
translation.it: Ci stiamo solo aiutando a vicenda.

translation.en: I know, not like this means anything.
How'd you get your V-cut like that?
translation.it: Come fai ad avere una V così?

translation.en: How about we use our anatomy, not talk about it? Seriously, though… what's your secret?
translation.it: - Usiamola l'anatomia, senza parlarne. - Sul serio. Qual è il tuo segreto?

translation.en: Don't know, I just dance.
translation.it: Non lo so, ballo e basta.

translation.en: I worked all summer on my external obliques trying to carve out a set,
translation.it: Ho passato l'estate a cercare di scolpire gli obliqui,

translation.en: and I can't get your results.
-Lucky me. -Hmm.
If you go to the gym, I should-- Oh, my God.
translation.it: Se tu vai in palestra, dovrei… Oddio.

translation.en: I didn't see you.
Nobody does.
[Neveah] Delia.
Dropping off the trash, all for you.
How do I know if I'm the right fit?
You just keep your neck long,
your hips small,
your arches high.
[June] And bone.
-They want to see bone. -[bones cracking]
June, stop!
-[whimpering] -You need help!
Help!
-[gasps] -[Delia] The only way out is up.
[Neveah] Mom! Mom!
Mom! Mom!
Mom!
[panting] Cassie.
You should never have come.
Pathetic.
You're shit.
Here to steal my secrets? No, thanks. I got my own.
translation.it: - Che fai, mi rubi i segreti? - No, grazie, ho i miei.

translation.en: Bet you do.
[Neveah] You're thinking about it too much.
Trying to show how hard you're working, like that gets you points or something?
translation.it: Ostenti la fatica come sei ci fosse una ricompensa.

translation.en: Except nobody wants to see you sweat.
I've had the country's top teacher-- And look where that got you.
translation.it: - Avevo il miglior insegnante… - E guarda come sei messa.

translation.en: You know you want to say something, so just say it.
translation.it: So che hai qualcosa da dire. Spara.

translation.en: Oh, no, I wouldn't want to mess you up.
translation.it: Oh, no. Non oserei mai incasinarti.

translation.en: Please.
What I do is I think of my hips turning on an axis.
translation.it: Io penso ai miei fianchi che ruotano su un asse.

translation.en: So when you go to start your turn…
translation.it: Quando stai per iniziare a girare…

translation.en: …you stay in the plié longer.
translation.it: resta più a lungo in plié.

translation.en: That way you're halfway into your turn before you're up.
translation.it: Così sei già a metà del giro.

translation.en: So it's a cheat?
Call it a dance hack.
Good, but stay in the plié longer.
translation.it: Bene, ma resta di più nel plié.

translation.en: Now you're dancing like a Whitlaw.
That was supposed to be a compliment, Miss Thing.
Know what it's like having a sister who just made principal dancer?
translation.it: Sai che significa una sorella prima ballerina?

translation.en: Everybody thinks that's why you got accepted here.
translation.it: Tutti pensano sia per quello che sei qui.

translation.en: Exactly.
I think it was your parents' money that got you in.
translation.it: Io penso che sia per i soldi dei tuoi.

translation.en: Which is why at crack of dawn…
I'm here.
♪ It's all up in the air now ♪
♪ Oh, let me go ♪ [vocalizing] ♪ Don't ♪
[Topher] Partnering. It is about working together,
but it's also about…
opposition.
About finding a language of reach and response.
translation.it: Un linguaggio per raggiungersi e reagire.

translation.en: A partner doesn't have to be a friend.
translation.it: Un partner non deve essere un amico.

translation.en: Nureyev was 20 years younger than Fonteyn.
translation.it: Nureyev era vent'anni più giovane della Fonteyn.

translation.en: Hallberg and Osipova, they did not even speak the same language.
translation.it: Hallberg e la Osipova non parlavano neanche la stessa lingua.

translation.en: But through the dance, you will find a bond,
translation.it: Ma troverete quel legame tramite la danza,

translation.en: or you will die trying.
Sarah, you will dance with Kirill.
Gwen, you'll dance with Josh.
Lily, you'll be with Evgeni.
-Emily with Lucas. Esmé with Caleb. -[students murmuring]
translation.it: - Emily e Lucas. - Sì! Esme e Caleb.

translation.en: Neveah with Oren.
June, you'll dance with Nabil,
and, Bette, you will be with Shane.
translation.it: e Bette farà coppia con Shane.

translation.en: Wait, I'm with Nabil? [gasps]
-Hey, Nabil. -Mr. Brooks, aren't I paired with Nabil?
translation.it: - Ciao, Nabil. - Signor Brooks, non sono io con Nabil?

translation.en: Ballet is ever-changing, Miss Whitlaw.
translation.it: La danza è un continuo mutamento.

translation.en: I just think I'm better off with him.
He's taller, je parle français, and he's, you know, my level.
translation.it: È più alto, je parle français… È, insomma, al mio livello.

translation.en: Shane is a fine dancer, quite capable of partnering you. Or…
translation.it: Shane è un bravo ballerino e può far coppia con te.

translation.en: do you question me? Of course not.
Thank you, sir.
Try to contain your enthusiasm.
You better fucking dance.
-[classical music playing] -[Topher] Let us begin. And that's right.
Piqué into fifth.
Tombé straight from that attitude, no hesitation.
-Turn out those petit battements, ladies. -[phone vibrates]
-Everything okay? -Just a message from an old friend.
translation.it: - Tutto bene? - Un messaggio di un vecchio amico.

translation.en: [Topher] No one needs to see that transition en face!
translation.it: Chi vuole vedere la transizione en face?

translation.en: Nabil, nice elevation on that lift.
Evgeni, get her further over her leg.
Bette, no, it's straight into passé relevé. There's no extra pas de bourrée. Stop cheating.
translation.it: Bette, no. Subito in passé relevé. Niente pas de bourré. Stai barando.

translation.en: Hold my hips, not my waist.
translation.it: Tienimi per i fianchi, non la vita.

translation.en: The transition from the pirouette into the attitude is late.
translation.it: La transizione dalle piroetta è lenta.

translation.en: You need to get the leg out and lift under the thigh.
translation.it: Porta fuori la gamba e lui ti alza dalla coscia.

translation.en: Well, I can't if he won't put me on my leg.
translation.it: Lui non mi mette sulla gamba.

translation.en: That's not the problem. You need to spot faster,
translation.it: Non è questo. Allungati più in fretta, anticipa l'arabesque e sta' al tuo posto.

translation.en: anticipate the arabesque, and get over your box.
translation.it: Allungati più in fretta, anticipa l'arabesque e sta' al tuo posto.

translation.en: -But if Shane-- -[Topher] Enough! I didn't correct Shane.
translation.it: - Ma Shane… - Basta. Non ho corretto Shane, ho corretto te.

translation.en: I corrected you, again.
translation.it: Non ho corretto Shane, ho corretto te.

translation.en: Show me the pirouette.
No, that's not working.
Let's try another section. I can't look at this anymore.
translation.it: Proviamo un'altra sezione. Basta con questa.

translation.en: Take it from the corner into the jetées.
-[classical music playing] -Come on, girl, you got this.
[Topher] Shane, faster hands. Bette, find your center.
translation.it: Shane, più veloce. Bette, il centro.

translation.en: Close your ribs and up, up, go up!
translation.it: Chiudi le costole e su, su, su!

translation.en: -[grunts] -[gasps] Lordy fuck, are you okay?
-[Bette] I'm fine. -Are you sure?
-[music stops] -Yes.
Yeah.
Let's do it again.
I'll spare you.
If you don't properly prepare for a lift, it will never work.
translation.it: Se non vi preparate adeguatamente per il sollevamento, non funzionerà mai.

translation.en: If your timing isn't in sync,
you need to find a way to save it, to adapt.
translation.it: dovete trovare il modo per salvarlo, e adattarvi.

translation.en: Has anyone been paying attention?
We have.
Well, all right, then. Show me the second half.
translation.it: Bene, andiamo. Rifate la seconda metà.

translation.en: We can go now.
More extension on that cambré.
Thank you.
We'll continue tomorrow.
[Ramon] Tomorrow's spoken for.
Tomorrow we begin auditions.
The rep this term is no longer The Sleeping Beauty.
Tomorrow, I work on a new ballet.
No Sleeping Beauty?
That little bitch.
We'll create a ballet of passion and darkness on the edge of desire.
translation.it: Sarà un balletto passionale, oscuro, pervaso dal desiderio.

translation.en: We tell the story…
of Jack the Ripper.
The sex maniac who killed those women, like, a hundred years ago?
translation.it: Il maniaco che uccideva le donne cent'anni fa?

translation.en: We'll find something more appropriate.
What could be better?
We live in a dark, twisted world full of loss, lies, and brutality.
translation.it: Il mondo di oggi è perverso e fatto di lutti, bugie e violenza.

translation.en: you have your ballet.
Auditions tomorrow. Go.
You know we have our favorites.
And so do I.
-June. -You were right.
I can't stop thinking about Cassie.
The thing is, she wasn't alone on the roof. And Madame DuBois knows it.
translation.it: Il fatto è… che non era sola sul tetto. E Madame DuBois lo sa.

translation.en: There was a secret party with every tier-three student but me.
translation.it: Una festa segreta con quelli del terzo, tranne me.

translation.en: I was in my room where I was supposed to be.
translation.it: Io ero in camera, dove dovevo essere.

translation.en: They all told me they were tucked in. If you see or hear anything--
translation.it: Hanno detto tutti di essere a letto. Se vedi o senti qualcosa…

translation.en: There won't be.
I won't be here much longer.
Got you some ice.
Don't need it.
[scoffs] Just chill.
Literally.
You were right.
Good. Feels better?
I mean about us dancing together this year.
translation.it: Intendevo su noi due che facciamo coppia.

translation.en: My parents could pull some strings.
No, you were right.
It's better we don't mix dance and our relationship.
translation.it: Meglio non mischiare danza e sentimenti.

translation.en: Because you had one good pas de deux and some easy choreography?
translation.it: È bastato un pas de deux di una coreografia facile?

translation.en: It wasn't easy for you.
[Bette] It would be if we were partners.
translation.it: Lo sarebbe stato ballando con te.

translation.en: Shane doesn't know how to handle me.
And plus, you know she's the reason I fell.
translation.it: Ed è stata lei a farmi cadere.

translation.en: She was pushing me this morning, making me do too much.
translation.it: Mi ha fatto stancare troppo stamattina.

translation.en: Right. It was Neveah's fault or Shane's or Brooks'.
translation.it: E va bene. È colpa di Neveah, o di Shane o di Brooks.

translation.en: But you were the one who fell, Bette.
translation.it: Ma sei tu che sei caduta.

translation.en: [Cassie] When you make that leap, you fly alone.
translation.it: Quando fai quel salto, voli da solo.

translation.en: It can help if there are others onstage with you,
translation.it: Aiuta se ci sono altre persone sul palcoscenico con te.

translation.en: that corps de ballet.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] They're the company's lowest, the corps.
translation.it: Sono il livello più basso, il corpo.

translation.en: [June sobbing] I'm so sorry.
[Cassie] The hungriest, most vulnerable.
I'm sorry.
[Cassie] Only there's power in that hunger.
translation.it: Ma in quella fame c'è forza.

translation.en: It drives you to take crazy risks,
translation.it: Ti porta a correre rischi folli,

translation.en: to do what it takes to stand out from the crowd.
translation.it: a fare di tutto per distinguerti.

translation.en: You risk too much,
fly too high…
-[screams] -…and you could end up like me, in this bed,
translation.it: e potresti finire come me, in questo letto

translation.en: clinging to life.
[Cassie] In the corps, your job is to fit in,
translation.it: Nel corpo, il tuo ruolo è adeguarti,

translation.en: to be an invisible part of a larger body while others claim the spotlight.
translation.it: essere parte invisibile di un tutto, in cui la scena è di altri.

translation.en: In French, "corps" means "body,"
or what you might call a corpse.
What all of us are fighting not to become.
It's that last turn nobody wants to make when you die…
translation.it: L'ultima piroetta che nessuno vuole fare, quando sei morto,

translation.en: or when enough people see you that way.
translation.it: o quando è come se lo fossi.

translation.en: ♪ All the stars ♪ ♪ All the stars that come at night Don't compare ♪
♪ It's hanging on the wall While you're stumbling, stumbling ♪ ♪ Stumbling, stumbling ♪
